content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Disabling Syslog Forwarding Use the Syslog Settings screen to stop forwarding logs from Trend Micro Apex Central to a syslog server. Procedure Go to Administration → Settings → Syslog Settings. The Syslog Settings screen appears. Clear the Enable syslog forwarding check box. Click Save. Trend Micro Apex Central stops forwarding logs to the configured syslog server. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
